mapper.select: select t1.EVENT_ID eventId, t4.ORDER_ID orderId, t1.BUSINESS_ID businessId, t3.BUSINESS_NAME businessName, t2.COMPANY_ID companyId, t2.COMPANY_NAME companyName, t1.OWNER_ID ownerId, t1.OWNER owner, t1.NEED_THIRD_PARTY needThirdParty, t1.THIRD_PARTY_ID thirdPartyId, t1.THIRD_PARTY_FEE thirdPartyFee, t1.BUSINESS_TAG businessTag, t1.PRE_EVENT_ID preEventId, t1.REMARK remark, DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createDate, t5.BEGIN_DATE dljzBeginDate, t5.END_DATE dljzEndDate, t5.IS_BEGIN dljzEndDate, t5.DIFF dljzDiff, t6.BEGIN_DATE gjjsbdjBeginDate, t6.END_DATE gjjsbdjEndDate, t6.DIFF gjjsbdjDiff, t6.EMPLOYEE_NUM employeeNum, t7. ABSENT absent, t7.REG_LOCATION_TYPE regLocationType from CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL t1 LEFT JOIN CRM_COMPANY_INFO t2 on t1.COMPANY_ID = t2.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN CRM_ORDER_DLJZ_DETAIL t5 on t1.EVENT_ID = t5.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN CRM_ORDER_GJJSBDJ_DETAIL t6 on t1.EVENT_ID = t6.EVENT_ID LEFT JOIN CRM_ORDER_GSZC_DETAIL t7 on t1.EVENT_ID = t7.EVENT_ID , CRM_BUSINESS_DICT t3, CRM_CUSTOM_ORDER_INFO t4 where t1.BUSINESS_ID = t3.BUSINESS_ID and t1.ORDER_ID = t4.ID and t1.ORDER_ID = #{query.orderId} order by t1.CREATE_DATE desc

select t2.ORDER_ID orderId, t2.RECEIVABLE_AMT receivableAmt, t4.COMPANY_NAME companyName, t6.CUSTOM_NAME customName, t4.DISTRICT district, t6.CONTACT_NUMBER contactNumber, t6.WANGWANG_ACCNT wangwangAccnt, t7.EMPLOYEE_NUM employeeNum, DATE_FORMAT(t3.BEGIN_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') beginDate, DATE_FORMAT(t3.END_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endDate
from CRM_ORDER_BUSINESS_REL t1 LEFT JOIN CRM_COMPANY_BUSINESS t3 on t1.BUSINESS_ID = t3.BUSINESS_ID and t1.COMPANY_ID = t3.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN CRM_COMPANY_INFO t4 on t3.COMPANY_ID = t4.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN CRM_ORDER_GJJSBDJ_DETAIL t7 on t1.ORDER_ID = t7.ORDER_ID and t1.BUSINESS_ID = t7.BUSINESS_ID, CRM_CUSTOM_ORDER_INFO t2, CRM_CUSTOM_BASIC_INFO t6 where t1.ORDER_ID = t2.ID and t2.CUSTOM_ID = t6.CUSTOM_ID and t1.EVENT_ID = #{eventId} and t4.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
